General.Name: Shenzhen Textile Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Textile (Holdings) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polarizers in China. The company offers polarizers for liquid crystal displays, TN, STN, TFT, OLED, 3D, dye sheet, optical film for touch screen, and other fields used in television, notebooks, navigators, monitors, vehicles, industrial controls, instruments, smart phones, wearable devices, 3D glasses, sunglasses, and other products. It is also involved in the textile and garment business, and property leasing and management. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
